EmailTemplate.description: PD Day Follow Up/thankyou Email Template
EmailTemplate.name: Negotiation Skills PD Day College of Southern Idaho Oct 30 (Follow-Up/thank you)
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending! 10/30/08
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for attending American Student Assistance's Professional Development Day Negotiation Skills Workshop at College of Southern Idaho on October 30,2008
It was a pleasure to see so many friendly faces.
Please contact us at training@amsa.com or 1-800-999-9080, ext. 3099 with any questions
Check our website for future training oppurtunities. http://www.amsa.com/fap/training/index.cfm
We look forward to seeing you at future ASA events.
